entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
